div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1613 Golan (anc. Gaulanitis or Trachoni- tis), 1940 Burial: c. 100-75 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 40 AE Antiochus VII: 1 (as Rois de Syrie 1166) Antiochus VIII: 1 (as Rois de Syrie 1447) Sidon?: 1 Tyre: 25 (as BMC 251) Judas Aristobulus: 2 (as BMC 3) Alexander Jannaeus: 1 (as BMC 30 ff.) Unc. Hasmonaean: 9 Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, RN 1958, pp. 175-6
